text: Tot, kogo Allakh vedet pryamym putem, sleduyet pryamym putem. A dlya togo, kogo Allakh vvodit v zabluzhdeniye, ty ne naydesh' pokroviteley vmesto Nego. V Den' voskreseniya My soberem ikh lezhashchimi nichkom, slepymi, nemymi, glukhimi. Ikh pristanishchem budet Geyenna. Kak tol'ko ona utikhayet, My dobavlyayem im plameni
